name: No Wings
description:
You are Drury, and you have sentenced to the "hole", a prision where criminals are thrown to die. You must escape from this prision using your chakram and defeating various insects while discovering this world.

No Wings is a platformer whose combat is based on throwing and retrieving a chakram. In this world you will find many insects, talk to some of them to find out more about the world. Avoid mysterious thorns and have fun on this little adventure to the surface.
